forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and windy at times. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and windy at times. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, possibly heavy at times early. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.
